item.title: NetworkEnjin – Part 0: PPPoE
item.description: An optional rough guide for configuring PPPoE connections in Linux

item.title: NetworkEnjin – Part 1: Routing with NFTables
item.description: How to install and configure basic routing in Linux using NFTables

item.title: NetworkEnjin – Part 2: DNS and DHCP with DNSMasq
item.description: How to install DNSMasq and then configure it to handle DHCP and DNS
